thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: COmfortable hotel
thread.title_full: COmfortable hotel - Review of Premier Inn London City (Tower Hill) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: chasepines
title: COmfortable hotel
text:
Our 4th visit. Within 5 minutes walk of Tower Hill tube.
no more than 6/8 minute walk from tower entrance.
Two pubs locally, wetherspoons across from hotel, the minories around corner on way to tube station.
this is in good location for sightseeing on foot to st Katherine's docks, HMS Belfast, the Tower.
If you like freebies, then Walkie talkie building, about 10 minutes walk (where you can see the sky garden for free, - you have to book 2/3. Weeks in advance.) if you can't walk far, tube to monument - one stop- for sky garden. DLR is by rptube station, you can have the day at Greenwich.
All in all
Brilliant location, lovely beds, clean room, value for money. what more could you want.
